column5: I've always enjoyed watching Dakar rally cant find coverage this year?

Coverage this year for Canada is with Versus but I haven't seen it as yet either.  http://www.dakar.com/dakar/2011/us/worldwide-tv-dakar.html  They seem to have a good website with live feeds so check it out at www.dakar.com  vance
Its not on OLN,Speed,Travel channels....I dont really like watching live feeds on the computer, but I suppose it's the future of Television.
USA & Canada - Versus TV, OLN says that on the web site but oln web site says nothing...this sucks
